GNATS
Generalized National Airspace Trajectory-Prediction System
Installation of GNATS Standalone Windows 10 Distribution

System Requirement

Hardware Requirement

  • Intel/AMD 64bit CPU 1Ghz and up
  • RAM capacity at least 4GB

Software Requirement

  • Windows 10 64bit Operating System
  • Java SDK 1.7 and later
  • Jpype(For Python codes)
    Tested on v0.6.3
    Please don't use newer version of Jpype. Currently GNATS is developed in Java 1.7 and it only works with Jpype 0.6.3.
    To install Jpype 0.6.3
    pip install JPype1==0.6.3
  • MATLAB(if applicable)
    Tested on MATLAB R2014b, R2015b, R2019b
  • SciLab(if applicable)
    Tested on v6.0.2 64bit on Windows 10
  • Octave(if applicable)
    Tested on v5.1.0 64bit on Windows 10
  • Python 2.7
  • R(if applicable)
    Tested on v3.4 on Windows 10
    In order to run Java library, please install package
    install.packages("rJava")

Installation of GNATS Standalone

Simply upzip NATS_Standalone .zip file. There is no further step.

You will see directory content like:

data<DIR>Directory of data files
dist_win<DIR>Directory of GNATS Standalone libraries
log<DIR>Directory of log files
sample<DIR>Directory of sample files
share<DIR>Background database
utility<DIR>Utility programs
README.txt
README_Examples.txt
TestRun.bat
What_is_New.txt

GNATS Standalone is a collection of API library files. It can be easily used and executed in your application programs. To have a first step into GNATS API, please take a look at Getting Started.
